Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.view.UI.GUI.boardstate

Class CommandGameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.view.UI.GUI.boardstate.CommandGameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameStateAbstract
public class CommandGameState
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameStateAbstract
Handle all the user interactions like OnBoard Clicks or Buttons. Implements a second Layer of State Pattern with TurnStateEnum enum.

  • Field Summary

    • updateFromServer

      public void updateFromServer​(CV_CommandExecutedGameEvent event)
      If not already Locked, the method lock the Worker and select a LOCKED STATE
      Specified by:
      updateFromServer in interface GameStateAbstract
      Parameters:
      event - The CV_CommandExecutedGameEvent received from the server.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • selectMsgSentState

      private TurnStateEnum selectMsgSentState​(WorkerStatus workerStatus)
      If the worker is already locked the method returns the MSG_SENT_LOCKED state, otherwise it returns the MSG_SENT_UNLOCKED state
      Parameters:
      workerStatus - represent the status of actual selected worker
      Returns:
      The next Game state based on the worker status

    • selectWorkerState

      private TurnStateEnum selectWorkerState​(WorkerStatus workerStatus)
      If the worker is already locked the method returns the Worker LOCKED state, otherwise it returns the Worker UNLOCKED state
      Parameters:
      workerStatus - represent the status of actual selected worker
      Returns:
      The next Game state based on the worker status

      enableGreen - boolean value, true to enable, false to disable the green.
      buttonToSet - TurnAction clicked to enable the green effect.

      enableGreen - boolean value, true to enable, false to disable the green.
      blockToSet - BlockTypeEnum clicked to enable the green effect.

      Parameters:
      commandEvent - The VC_PlayerCommandGameEvent to test.
      Returns:
      true if the command is valid, false otherwise.
